CustomField.formula: IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 0, "", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 100, "£0-£100", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 150, "£100-£150", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 200, "£150-£200", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 300, "£200-£300", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 400, "£300-£400", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 500, "£400-£500", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 600, "£500-£600", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 800, "£600-£800", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c <= 1000, "£800-£1000", IF(KPI_Average_Booking_Price_Last_Year__c > 1000, "£1000+","Error" )))))))))))
CustomField.label: Krux Average Booking Price (Last Year)
